title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: Functional Analysis, Linear AlgebraGeometric form of Hahn Banach theorem, convex sets and cones in normed linear spaces, convex functionals, conjugate convex functionals, subdifferential, quasi and pseudo and other generalized convex functionals and their properties. Optimality and duality in normed linear spaces. Monotone operators, variational inequality, complementarity problem, equilibrium problem
